prompts:
Hello, Claude. So, in this chat, you and I are going to be going back and forth just at a conceptual level. I am going to be updating Thoughtbox to support primitives and utilities from the newest Model Context Protocol specification. These new features and utilities are documented in your mcp-builder skill. \
\
I would like for you to take a look at the codebase and at the docs at local-docs/mcp-spec-2025-11-25-jan26/ , as well as use Thoughtbox yourself as a user, to get a sense of the opportunities that this update opens up. Hint: Thoughtbox can become very, VERY powerful with some of these, especially sampling with tools.\
\
Write a markdown report in a reports/ folder at the root of the project describing some high-utility updates that *you* would find useful to have on Thoughtbox. Remember: you are the intended user for this tool --> its existence is meant to maximize your utility.

Use Thoughtbox to reason through and validate or disprove the hypothesis at @reports/sampling-with-tools-compression-hypothesis.md --> produce a markdown report in the reports/ folder with your findings.
